nodes.text: The Burning Plains was a region of the Outer Rim lava planet Mustafar which boasted heavy volcanic activity. The area was to the north of Mustafar's giant central volcano, and it was one of the few contant features of the planet.

The Burning Plains was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the seventeenth issue of De Agostini's Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around April 29, 2015. The plains originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it appeared in the 2005 Trials of Obi-Wan expansion to the 2003 Sony Online Entertainment massively multiplayer online role-playing game, Star Wars Galaxies.
